name: Neighborhorde
description: Neighborhorde is a couch co-op shoot-em-up where you and your team of friends use toys as weapons and game-changing superpowers to try to survive the attacks of evil robots and zombie Abe Lincolns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.5+ GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with AT LEAST 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
